conversation.label: Kennedy:
conversation.name: Kennedy
conversation.phrase: Your work has been a real boon to bloggers. Why did you decide to take the Creative Commons route rather than focus on selling your work?

conversation.name: Skidmore
conversation.phrase: My interest has always been to see my photos used as widely as possible. If someone wants to pay me to use my work, that is really only a bonus. But I find that attribution is sometimes more rewarding in getting your name out there among the crowd, which will continue to use your photos.
conversation.label: Skidmore:

conversation-text:
Kennedy: Your work has been a real boon to bloggers. Why did you decide to take the Creative Commons route rather than focus on selling your work?
Skidmore: My interest has always been to see my photos used as widely as possible. If someone wants to pay me to use my work, that is really only a bonus. But I find that attribution is sometimes more rewarding in getting your name out there among the crowd, which will continue to use your photos.
